column1: If you found yourself as a professional wrestler in the newly formed CBWF (Christian Broadcasting Wrestling Federation) and your next opponent was your evil twin with a famous televangelist as his or her hype-man, name a famous theologian you would choose as a tag-team partner.
Spurgeon he was a big man
John Calvin aka The Cleaver from Geneva
Luther... Iâ€™m pretty sure that guy could throw down
Martin Luther (He can really nail it)
R.C. Sproul if he were still with us.
Saint Boniface (If he can use his axe)
St Nicholas, the Smacker of Arians
St. Nicholas (if allowing the dead); John MacArthur (if only allowing living ones)
Steven Furtick (he's ripped! and you didnt say they have to be a good theologian)
